DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the relationship between deep brain stimulation implantation site and DTI (diffusion tensor imaging) derived measures for the region and later compare this to the clinical treatment outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Diffusion MRI as a Tool in Planning Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS)
DOC.criteria: Deep Brian Stimulation surgery DBS treatment stopped before 12 month followup
